name: deserializeProtobuf
syntax: serializeProtobuf(data, schema [, messageType, queryFormat, useCustomSerialization, protoPath])
description: Converts a Protobuf data representation into CFML data.

params.name: schema
params.description: The Protobuf schema as a string or the absolute path to the schema

params.name: messageType
params.description: A message type from given schema as string. This is optional if schema contains one and only one message type.

params.name: strictMapping
params.description: Specifies whether to convert the Protobuf strictly. If true, converts the Protobuf binary to matching ColdFusion data types.

params.name: protoPath
params.description: Specifies a directory in which the compiler looks for imported files defined in the schema. By default, it will be the current schema's parent path.

links.title: Avro and Protocol Buffer in ColdFusion
links.description: Overview of Avro and Protobuf, including how to use them in ColdFusion

examples.title: Deserialize a Protobuf serialized query (Script syntax)
